body_html: This will be NULL in this case, but it will still be added to roots, causing the engine to segfault. It only happens for Variables that don't have a grad_fn (leaves) and have no grad_accumulator (requires_grad=False). We can skip such entries or raise an error (because it's unlikely that someone wanted to do this).
